ResearchProjectDef.label: biological distillation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Distill nutrient solution and protein mash at the Biofuel Refinery. Both are vitally important when growing living tissue in vats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ vat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Organ Vats that grow organs with nutrient solution and protein mash. The first step to understanding how to grow full living beings is by growing parts of them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: genome sequencing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create Genome Sequencers at the Machining Table. Right-click the sequencer and choose a living or dead pawn to sequence their genetic makeup via surgery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cloning vat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow a living being in a Clone Vat. Larger beings need more nutrients and proteins to grow. Clones will be created with no skill points and random passions, but future research can modify that without training.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize protein mash from nutrient solution at the Biofuel Refinery. Advances in chemistry have made it possible to hijack natural biological processes in this way.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neutroamine synthesizing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize neutroamine from nutrient solution and protein mash by cleverly combining stem cells with bio-engineered organisms. Neutroamine can now be made at the Drug Lab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: edibles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create synthetic meat and nutrient paste at cooking stoves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: natural internal organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow natural internal organs in the Organ Vat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: natural sensory organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow natural eyes, ears and noses in the Organ Vat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: natural bones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow bones in the Organ Vat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: natural limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grow natural arms, hands, legs and feet in the Organ Vat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brainwave scanning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a brain scanner at the Machining Table that can map the brainwaves of a pawn. The template preserves the pawn's skill proficiencies and passions. Apply the template on newly-created clones to quickly get them up-to-speed, or use it on other pawns to increase their effectiveness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nerve stapling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a high-cost brain implant at the Machining Table that stimulates the control centers of the brain, allowing a pawn to be easily controlled. It can turn the most unruly prisoner into a willing slave, but is considered atrocious by many civilized societies. As a side effect, the pawn's learning ability is severly hampered.
